requirements: NDE: UT 100% of block-to-block butt welds
applied_measures.rule_ref: Block-to-block butt welds in adjacent strakes shall be staggered by at least 300 mm.

evidence.raw_text: Block-to-block butt welds in adjacent strakes shall be staggered by at least 300 mm.

requirements: Periodic in-service NDE required
Frequency and extent to be agreed with LR
applied_measures.rule_ref: Where enhanced NDE is selected as the crack arrest measure, stricter acceptance criteria per ShipRight procedure apply. CTOD value shall be not less than 0.18 mm. Electrogas welding (EGW) is not permitted.

evidence.raw_text: Note 2: Where enhanced NDE is selected as Measure 3, periodic in-service NDE (Measure 2) may be required at frequency and extent to be agreed with LR.

requirements: Enhanced NDE method: PAUT
Stricter acceptance criteria per ShipRight procedure apply
CTOD >= 0.18 mm required
Electrogas welding (EGW) is NOT permitted

requirements: LR-approved partial joint penetration (PJP) welding REQUIRED
applied_measures.rule_ref: The connection of hatch coaming to upper deck shall be made using LR-approved partial joint penetration (PJP) welding.

evidence.raw_text: The connection of hatch coaming to upper deck shall be made using LR-approved partial joint penetration (PJP) welding.

notes: Welding detail rule – always applicable for coaming-to-deck connections

requirements: Provide BCA steel – type: BCA2
Per Table 8.2.2 for upper deck plate in cargo hold region
applied_measures.condition_expr: Measure 4 required AND role=upper_deck_plate AND zone=cargo_hold_region
applied_measures.rule_ref: The connection of hatch coaming to upper deck shall be made using LR-approved partial joint penetration (PJP) welding.

evidence.raw_text: The connection of hatch coaming to upper deck shall be made using LR-approved partial joint penetration (PJP) welding.
Hatch coaming side plate in way of cargo hold region shall be provided with brittle crack arrest (BCA) steel.

Per Table 8.2.2 for upper deck plate (extended range, separate traceability)
